ReportSection.title: ATSEC Decision Regarding Merit
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Eleni Stroulia
Vice Dean of Science
Chair Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee

I am writing to inform you that the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee (ATSEC) has accepted the recommendation of your Department Chair and awarded you {getText(RP_CHAIR, FEC_REVIEW, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 0, 0)} merit increment in recognition of your achievements during the past evaluation period. The award takes effect on July 1, 2023.

Each year, the ATSEC is charged with the responsibility of awarding merit increments to its faculty from an increment pool that is currently equal to 1.2 of the eligible staff within the Faculty.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your work this past year and to wish you continued success in your teaching

Sincerely,


Eleni Stroulia
Vice Dean of Science
Chair of the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee
